wikipedia_page.main: Richard John Landon (born 22 March 1970) is an English former footballer who played as a forward. He made 83 appearances in the Football League for Plymouth Argyle, Stockport County, Rotherham United and Macclesfield Town.

response: *Record transfer fee received: £30,000 from Plymouth Argyle for Richard Landon, 1994
* Richard Landon, footballer with Plymouth Argyle, was born in Worthing in 1970
